name: The Orb Games
description: Explore the islands and find the key shards that will unlock your freedom. You play as a scholar who is on a journey to discover the key to happiness.  Your journey had a drastic turn in events and you were stranded in the Offworld. With no way home and the wit to rival the greatest scientists of your time, you need to find the key to happiness and escape the endless cycle that is the Offworld.
